00070     GraphicsManager::~GraphicsManager()
00071     {
00072         DestroyRenderWindow();
00073         SDL_FreeSurface(SDLscreen);
00074         SDL_Quit();
00075     }

00077     void GraphicsManager::Construct(const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_, const bool &FullScreen_ )
00078     {
00079         this->FrameDelay = 0;
00080         this->Fullscreen = FullScreen_;
00081         this->RenderHeight = Height_;
00082         this->RenderWidth = Width_;
00083         this->Priority = 0;
00084     }

00086     void GraphicsManager::CreateRenderWindow()
00087     {
00088         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00089         GameWorld->Log("Entering CreateRenderWindow()");
00090         #endif
00091         /// @todo TODO set multithreaded SDL so it will the run event manager in another thread
00092         //Get what is needed for SDL started
00093         if (SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO) < 0) {
00094             GameWorld->Log("Error 2: Unable to init SDL, SDL Error Follows:");
00095             GameWorld->LogAndThrow(SDL_GetError());
00096         }
00097         SDLBeenInitialized = true;
00098         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00099         GameWorld->Log("Initialized SDL");
00100         #endif
00101 
00102                 try
00103                 {
00104                         //Setup the SDL render window
00105                         if(Fullscreen)
00106                         {
00107                             this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL | SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00108                         }else{
00109                 this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL);
00110                         }
00111                         SDL_WM_SetCaption(GameWorld->GetWindowName().c_str(), NULL);
00112                         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00113             GameWorld->Log("Successfully Setup SDL");
00114             #endif
00115                 }catch (exception& e) {
00116                     GameWorld->Log("Failed to Setup SDL");
00117                         GameWorld->LogAndThrow(e.what());
00118                 }
00119 
00120         //Start Ogre Without a native render window
00121         try
00122         {
00123             //crossplatform::WaitMilliseconds(1000);
00124             OgreGameWindow = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().initialise(false, GameWorld->GetWindowName());
00125             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00126             GameWorld->Log("Setup Ogre Window");
00127             #endif
00128         }catch (exception& e) {
00129                     GameWorld->Log("Failed to Setup Ogre Window");
00130                         GameWorld->LogAndThrow(e.what());
00131                 }
00132 
00133         //Configure Ogre to render to the SDL window
00134         Ogre::NameValuePairList *misc;
00135         misc=(Ogre::NameValuePairList*) crossplatform::GetSDLOgreBinder();
00136         (*misc)["title"] = Ogre::String(GameWorld->GetWindowName());
00137         OgreGameWindow = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().createRenderWindow(GameWorld->GetWindowName(), RenderHeight, RenderWidth, Fullscreen, misc);
00138         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00139         GameWorld->Log("Bound Ogre to an SDL window");
00140         #endif
00141 
00142         //setup a default camera unless has been setup yet
00143         Camera* camera = NULL;
00144         if(GameWorld->GetCameraManager()==0)
00145         {
00146             GameWorld->AddManager(new phys::CameraManager(0));
00147         }
00148         camera = GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetDefaultCamera();
00149         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00150         GameWorld->Log("Created Default Camera");
00151         #endif
00152 
00153         //viewport connects camera and render window
00154         Ogre::Viewport* OgreViewport = NULL;
00155         OgreViewport = OgreGameWindow->addViewport(camera->GetOgreCamera());
00156         GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->Viewports["Viewport1"] = OgreViewport;
00157 
00158         //setting the aspect ratio must be done after we setup the viewport
00159         camera->SetAspectRatio( (Real)(OgreViewport->getActualWidth()) / Ogre::Real(OgreViewport->getActualHeight()) );
00160         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00161         GameWorld->Log("Configured Viewport and Aspect Ratio");
00162         #endif
00163     }
00164 
00165     void GraphicsManager::DestroyRenderWindow()
00166     {
00167         OgreGameWindow->destroy();
00168     }
00169 
00170     void GraphicsManager::UpdateWindowStats()
00171     {
00172         GameWorld->Log("Updating Screen Mode. ");
00173         if(Fullscreen)
00174         {
00175             GameWorld->Log("Setting SDL. ");
00176             this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL | SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00177             GameWorld->Log("Setting Ogre. ");
00178             OgreGameWindow->setFullscreen(true,RenderWidth,RenderHeight);
00179         }else{
00180             GameWorld->Log("Setting SDL. ");
00181             this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL);
00182             GameWorld->Log("Setting Ogre. ");
00183             OgreGameWindow->setFullscreen(false,RenderWidth,RenderHeight);
00184         }
00185         //OgreGameWindow->windowMovedOrResized();
00186         GameWorld->Log("Updating Viewport. ");
00187         GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetOgreViewport("Viewport1")->setDimensions(0,0,1,1);
00188         //GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetOgreViewport("Viewport1")->_updateDimensions();
00189         //GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetDefaultCamera()->SetAspectRatio((Real)RenderWidth/(Real)RenderHeight);
00190         GameWorld->Log("Updating User Interface. ");
00191         GameWorld->GetUIManager()->RedrawAll(true);
00192         GameWorld->Log("Done Updating Screen Mode. ");
00193     }

00203     //returns: false if changes could not be made
00204     void GraphicsManager::setFullscreen(const bool &Fullscreen_)
00205     {
00206         /// @todo TODO: Need to attempt to switch to fullscreen here
00207         /// @todo TODO: We really should double check that going into fullscreen worked the way we wanted, this fails in too many games
00208         this->Fullscreen = Fullscreen_;
00209         UpdateWindowStats();
00210     }

00260     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00261     //Shows the ogre settings Dialog, and allows it to save settings to ogres
00262     //preset save location
00263     bool GraphicsManager::ShowGraphicsSettingDialog()
00264     {
00265         try
00266         {
00267             return Ogre::Root::getSingleton().showConfigDialog();
00268         } catch (exception& e) {
00269             this->GameWorld->Log("Ogre settings windows from main UI or mandatory setting failure");
00270             this->GameWorld->Log(e.what());
00271             return false;
00272         }
00273     }

00307     //Inherited From ManagerBase
00308     void GraphicsManager::Initialize()
00309     {
00310         CreateRenderWindow();
00311         this->RenderTimer = new Ogre::Timer();
00312     }
00313 
00314     void GraphicsManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00315     {
00316         GameWorld->Log("Rendering the World.");
00317         Ogre::WindowEventUtilities::messagePump();
00318         if(1)//OgreGameWindow->isActive())
00319         {
00320             crossplatform::RenderPhysWorld(this->GameWorld, this->OgreGameWindow);
00321         }else if( !OgreGameWindow->isActive() && OgreGameWindow->isVisible()){
00322             OgreGameWindow->update();
00323         }else{
00324             GameWorld->Log("Aborted Rendering, target is not active");
00325             // clear timings to allow smooth alt-tabbing action.
00326             Ogre::Root::getSingleton().clearEventTimes();
00327         }
00328         GameWorld->Log("Finished Rendering");
00329 
00330         //Do Time Calculations to Determine Rendering Time
00331         this->GameWorld->SetFrameTime( this->RenderTimer->getMilliseconds() );
00332         this->RenderTimer->reset();
00333         if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() > this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00334             FrameDelay++;
00335         }else if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() == this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00336         }else{
00337             if (0<FrameDelay){
00338                 FrameDelay--;
00339             }else{
00340                 FrameDelay=0;
00341             }
00342         }
00343         crossplatform::WaitMilliseconds( FrameDelay );
00344     }
00345 
00346     ManagerBase::ManagerTypeName GraphicsManager::GetType() const
00347         { return ManagerBase::GraphicsManager; }
00348 
00349     bool GraphicsManager::PostMainLoopItems()
00350     {
00351         this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->AddEvent(new EventRenderTime(this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()));
00352         return ManagerBase::PostMainLoopItems();
00353     }
